import warnings;warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

%matplotlib inline
source.50faa46e:
tmp = data.groupby('profession/title')['name'].count().reset_index().sort_values('name',ascending=False)
tmp.columns = ['profession/title','number']
plt.figure(figsize=(25,5))
sns.barplot(data=tmp,x='profession/title',y='number')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.title('bar plot for number of each profession/title')
plt.show()
source.745236f5:
tmp = data.groupby('sex')['name'].count().reset_index().sort_values('name',ascending=False)
tmp.columns = ['sex','number']
plt.figure(figsize=(5,5))
sns.barplot(data=tmp,x='sex',y='number')
plt.title('bar plot for number of each sex')
plt.show()
source.b2fb46a7:
data['age_box'] = data['age'].apply(lambda x:str((x//10)*10)+"~"+str(((x//10)+1)*10))
tmp = data.groupby('age_box')['name'].count().reset_index().sort_values('name',ascending=False)
tmp.columns = ['age_box','number']
plt.figure(figsize=(15,5))
sns.barplot(data=tmp,x='age_box',y='number')
plt.title('bar plot for number of age')
plt.show()
source.6ba02d2f:
tmp = data.groupby('date')['name'].count().reset_index().sort_values('date')
tmp.columns = ['date','number']
plt.figure(figsize=(15,5))
sns.lineplot(data=tmp,x='date',y='number')
plt.title('line plot for number of date')
plt.show()
source.1ff2b481:
tmp = data[['date','sex','name']]
tmp = tmp.groupby(['date','sex']).count().reset_index()
entitys = list(tmp['sex'].unique())
entity_list = [tmp[tmp['sex']==entity] for entity in entitys]
entity_list = [[entity[entity['date']==date].iloc[0]['name'] if len(entity[entity['date']==date])>0 else 0 for date in tmp['date'].unique()] for entity in entity_list]
plt.figure(figsize=(25,5))
plt.stackplot(tmp['date'].unique(),np.vstack(entity_list),labels=entitys)
plt.title('Stack plot for number of each sex')
plt.legend()
plt.show()
source.5e6228bb:
tmp = data[['date','sex','name']]
tmp = tmp.groupby(['date','sex']).count().reset_index()
entitys = list(tmp['sex'].unique())
entity_list = [tmp[tmp['sex']==entity] for entity in entitys]
entity_list = [[entity[entity['date']==date].iloc[0]['name'] if len(entity[entity['date']==date])>0 else 0 for date in tmp['date'].unique()] for entity in entity_list]
sum_list = [sum([entity[i] for entity in entity_list]) for i in range(len(list(tmp['date'].unique())))]
entity_list = [[entity_list[i][j]/sum_list[j] for j in range(len(list(tmp['date'].unique())))] for i in range(len(entitys))]
plt.figure(figsize=(25,5))
plt.stackplot(tmp['date'].unique(),np.vstack(entity_list),labels=entitys)
plt.title('Stack plot for percent of each sex')
plt.legend()
plt.show()
